headline: Moderna (MRNA) Suffers a Larger Drop Than the General Market: Key Insights
summary: The latest trading day saw Moderna (MRNA) settling at $33.64, representing a -1.87% change from its previous close.

headline: U.S. Physical Therapy, Evolent Health, Charles River Laboratories, Moderna, and Intuitive Surgical Shares Are Falling, What You Need To Know
summary: A number of stocks fell in the morning session after the U.S. administration announced a sharp escalation in trade tensions by threatening new tariffs on Canada.

headline: MRNA Stock Up on Full FDA Nod for COVID-19 Jab in Pediatric Patients
summary: Moderna stock jumps 4.5% as the FDA grants full approval for its COVID-19 vaccine in high-risk individuals aged six months to 11 years.

headline: Moderna to Report Second Quarter 2025 Financial Results on Friday, August 1, 2025
summary: CAMBRIDGE, MA / ACCESS Newswire / July 11, 2025 / Moderna, Inc. (NASDAQ:MRNA) today announced that it will host a live conference call and webcast at 8:00 a.m. ET on Friday, August 1, 2025 to report its second quarter 2025 financial results, and provide ...

headline: 2 Stocks Under $50 on Our Watchlist and 1 to Ignore
summary: The $10-50 price range often includes mid-sized businesses with proven track records and plenty of growth runway ahead. They also usually carry less risk than penny stocks, though they’re not immune to volatility as many lack the scale advantages of their larger peers.
